con:testCase.name: 4.16.2 (GA) Patient med engagemang hos en producent(LOAD-MOCKS) med 1 eller flera poster

con:configuration.scriptText: import se.skl.rivta.tksupport.soapui.ContentAssertions def ca = new ContentAssertions(context, messageExchange, log) ca.assertNonEmptyResponse() ca.assertSpecificValueInAllRecords('/urn:activityGroup/urn1:patient/urn1:id/urn1:extension', context.patientId)

import se.skl.rivta.tksupport.soapui.ContentAssertions def ca = new ContentAssertions(context, messageExchange, log) ca.assertNonEmptyResponse() ca.assertSpecificValueInAllRecords('/urn:activityGroup/urn1:patient/urn1:id/urn1:extension', context.patientId)

con:testCase.name: 4.16.3 (GA) Patient med engagemang hos tre producenter med vardera 1 post

con:configuration.scriptText: import se.skl.rivta.tksupport.soapui.ContentAssertions def ca = new ContentAssertions(context, messageExchange, log) ca.assertNonEmptyResponse() ca.assertSpecificValueInAnyRecord('/urn:activityGroup/urn1:sourceSystem/urn1:id/urn1:extension', "SKLTP-MOCK01") ca.assertSpecificValueInAnyRecord('/urn:activityGroup/urn1:sourceSystem/urn1:id/urn1:extension', "SKLTP-MOCK02") ca.assertSpecificValueInAnyRecord('/urn:activityGroup/urn1:sourceSystem/urn1:id/urn1:extension', "SKLTP-MOCK03")

import se.skl.rivta.tksupport.soapui.ContentAssertions def ca = new ContentAssertions(context, messageExchange, log) ca.assertNonEmptyResponse() ca.assertSpecificValueInAllRecords('/urn:activityGroup/urn1:patient/urn1:id/urn1:extension', context.patientId1)
